entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 30%
